title: Opéra de Québec
text:
Opéra de Québec or Opera of Quebec City is a Canadian opera company founded in 1983; it is related to <a href="Op%C3%A9ra%20de%20Montr%C3%A9al">Opéra de Montréal</a>, founded in 1980. The company does not have its own venue but performs in the <a href="Grand%20Th%C3%A9%C3%A2tre%20de%20Qu%C3%A9bec">Grand Théâtre de Québec</a> on 269 Boulevard René-Lévesque Est.
A previous professional Montréal-based opera company, the Opéra du Québec (i.e. "of Le <a href="Qu%C3%A9bec">Québec</a>," the province), had operated in Montréal from 1971 to 1975 and also performed in <a href="Quebec%20City">Quebec City</a>. There is also an annual Québec Opera Festival.
